Package sketchy.compiler

Class ClassFileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.tools.ForwardingJavaFileManager<javax.tools.StandardJavaFileManager>
      • sketchy.compiler.ClassFileManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, javax.tools.JavaFileManager, javax.tools.OptionChecker
    public class ClassFileManager
extends javax.tools.ForwardingJavaFileManager<javax.tools.StandardJavaFileManager>
    File Manager for our in-memory compiler.

    https://stackoverflow.com/questions/12173294/compile-code-fully-in-memory-with-javax-tools-javacompiler https://javapracs.blogspot.com/2011/06/dynamic-in-memory-compilation-using.html

    We stopped using the approach in the link https://atamur.blogspot.com/2009/10/using-built-in-javacompiler-with-custom.html because it breaks the normal class loading so the class loader cannot find sketchy.data.Data class.

    • Nested Class Summary
